title: Sports
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: 2025 College Football Playoff Buzz: Chambliss to Remain at Ole Miss, Pending Waiver
items.description: Here's the latest on what's happening around college football during the postseason.

items.title: 2025 NFL MVP Odds, Race: Matt Stafford Closes Regular Season as Favorite
items.description: Matthew Stafford might have regained the NFL MVP award with an outstanding Week 18 performance.

items.title: 2025 NFL AFC, NFC Title Odds: Broncos, Seahawks Favored to Make Big Game
items.description: Put plainly, both conferences are up for grabs as the playoffs begin. See the latest odds.

items.title: 2026 NFL Coaching/GM Tracker: Bengals Keeping Taylor, Giants Retaining Schoen
items.description: The coaching carousel for the 2026 offseason is about to get moving. Here are the latest news and rumors from around the NFL!

items.title: Falcons Reportedly Expected to Hire Matt Ryan for New President of Football Ops Role
items.description: The Atlanta Falcons appear set to bring back a franchise icon.

items.title: Sack records: Garrett makes history; Broncos' D four shy of team record
items.description: The Browns' vet edge rusher breaks the single-season sack record, and the Broncos' defense comes up short.

items.title: Tracking NFL coaching changes: Four openings after the Browns and Falcons make changes
items.description: The Browns fired Kevin Stefanski after six seasons with the team. There are now four head coach openings around the NFL. Here's what to know.

items.title: FCS national championship preview: Illinois State, Montana State starving for title
items.description: Will the Bobcats break through or can the Redbirds cap their amazing run in style?

items.title: Steelers escape Ravens' late push, win AFC North title
items.description: In a rock fight that morphed into a fourth-quarter track meet, Pittsburgh edges Baltimore to advance.

items.title: Barnwell makes his NFL award picks: Ranking candidates for MVP, Rookie of the Year, more
items.description: Drake Maye or Matthew Stafford for MVP? Which rookies should earn hardware? And no one is beating out Myles Garrett for DPOY, right?
